title: Interviews
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interviewing
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Cinematography
description: Episode number 3 of Series "On camera: the BBC video production course". Deals with interview techniques both inside and outside the studio. Shows how to shoot an interview using either one or two cameras. Diagrams are used to relate camera position, interviewer and guest to what appears on the scree. The importance of cutaways, shot sizes and the positioning of props are also covered.
related_objects: Series; S01166; On camera: the BBC video production course; Active; 1984
